content.title: Talk to God
content.text: God wants to communicate with all of us.

references.text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
then God's wonderful peace that transcends human understanding, will make the answers known to you through Jesus Christ.

content.prompt: Would you like to use YouVersion to grow your prayer life?
content.subject: Worries that I am lifting up in prayer

content.prompt: Take a moment to pray over this verse.
